wikipedia_page.main: T. Percy Davies (birth unknown – death unknown), also known by the nickname of "Ponty", was a Welsh professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1920s. He played at representative level for Wales and at club level for Pontypridd and Warrington, as a prop, or second-row, i.e. number 8 or 10, or, 11 or 12, during the era of contested scrums.
